list.name: user_id
list.label: User
list.query: SELECT u.username AS __text, u.user_id::text AS __value FROM users u ORDER BY 1;

targets.rawSql:
SELECT month_start AS time, SUM(total_seconds) / 3600.0 AS value
FROM user_monthly_stats
WHERE month_start >= DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) - INTERVAL '12 months'
GROUP BY month_start
ORDER BY month_start;

panels.title: Top 10 Users by Voice Hours (This Week)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COALESCE(u.username, s.user_id::text) AS metric, s.total_seconds / 3600.0 AS value
FROM user_weekly_stats s
LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id = s.user_id
WHERE s.year = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM NOW())
  AND s.week = EXTRACT(WEEK FROM NOW())
ORDER BY s.total_seconds DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Top 10 Users by Voice Hours (This Month)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COALESCE(u.username, s.user_id::text) AS metric, s.total_seconds / 3600.0 AS value
FROM user_monthly_stats s
LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id = s.user_id
WHERE s.year = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM NOW())
  AND s.month = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM NOW())
ORDER BY s.total_seconds DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT s.week_start AS time, s.total_seconds / 3600.0 AS value
FROM user_weekly_stats s
WHERE s.user_id = ${user_id}::bigint
  AND s.week_start >= NOW() - INTERVAL '12 weeks'
ORDER BY s.week_start;

SELECT s.month_start AS time, COALESCE(u.username, s.user_id::text) AS metric, s.total_seconds / 3600.0 AS value
FROM user_monthly_stats s
LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id = s.user_id
WHERE s.month_start >= NOW() - INTERVAL '6 months'
ORDER BY s.month_start, s.total_seconds DESC;

panels.title: Top 10 Users by Voice Hours (Last Month)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COALESCE(u.username, s.user_id::text) AS metric, s.total_seconds / 3600.0 AS value
FROM user_monthly_stats s
LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id = s.user_id
WHERE s.year = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month'))
  AND s.month = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month'))
ORDER BY s.total_seconds DESC
LIMIT 10;
